name: Ping Pong
game_info: Test your reflexes in a game of ping pong. Compete against the computer or challenge your friends in multiplayer mode. With simple controls and challenging gameplay, this fast-paced game will keep you on your toes. Will you rise to the top and become the ultimate ping pong champion? Serve up some fun and find out!
cartText: Tour the world and face skilled competitors in this remastering of a timeless classic

name: Super Duper
game_info: Super Duper lets your child learn at his or hers owns pace without the need for assistance! Gamemodes for all ages included. Math, Science, History, Biology and much more is ready at your fingertips! Dont miss your chance to get in on this deal!
cartText: Explore a fun and engaging world of learning with Superduper, the educational game that will leave you smarter and entertained.

name: Black
game_info: Enter the terrifying world of Black. Solve puzzles and uncover clues to unravel the mystery behind the darkness. But beware, danger lurks around every corner. Can you survive the horrors that await, or will you succumb to the darkness? Test your courage and step into the world of Black.
cartText: Enter the realm of terror and face your deepest fears in Black, the horror game that will keep you up at night.

name: Furious
game_info: Become the ultimate monster hunter in Furious. Track down and defeat fierce creatures using an array of weapons and tools. But be ready for a tough fight, as the monsters won't go down easily. Sharpen your skills and prepare for battle in this action-packed game. Can you rise to the challenge and emerge victorious?
cartText: Hunt monsters and unleash your wrath in Furious, the action-packed RPG that will test your skills.

name: Assassin
game_info: Step into the role of a deadly assassin. Infiltrate enemy territory and eliminate high-profile targets. Any misstep can lead to your demise, as your enemies are on high alert and ready to strike back. Will you be able to complete your mission without being seen and become the true master of stealth?
cartText: Embrace the life of a deadly assassin and complete thrilling missions in this epic action RPG

name: Space War
game_info: Battle for domination as 7 different playable races. Gather more resources and crush your opponents in an epic shodown for survival. However beware of the alien hives that tunnel under the ground. You never know what horrors you will encounter in the darkest corners of space.
cartText: Discover and wage war upon ancient alien civilizations in the smash hit Space War

name: Racing
game_info: Race to the top with customizable vehicles across challenging terrains. Outsmart skilled opponents and navigate unexpected obstacles to cross the finish line first. Only the bravest drivers will come out on top in this adrenaline-fueled competition.
cartText: Buckle up and get ready for the ultimate racing experience in Racer, the high-speed game that will leave you breathless.

name: Boxer
game_info: Step into the ring as a rising star to become the undisputed champion of the world! Outsmart and outclass opponents with lightning-fast punches and quick footwork in matches that will test your skill and strategy. Train hard, earn the respect of the boxing community and become the ultimate Boxing Champion!
cartText: Step into the ring and prove your boxing skills in this immersive game, Boxer, where every punch counts

name: Cyberpunk
game_info: Experience Cyberpunk, a streetfighter game where skilled combatants fight for survival in a world of high-tech machines and rogue hackers. Engage in intense battles against rival fighters with lightning-fast reflexes and a wide range of moves. Do you have what it takes to thrive in this world? Enter the ring to find out.
cartText: Enter a futuristic world of chaos and fight your way through deadly opponents in Cyberpunk, the ultimate fighting game

name: Forge Legend
game_info: Forge Legend is an epic MMO game where you create your own character and explore a fantasy world. Join forces with friends to defeat monsters, complete quests, and build alliances to dominate the realm. Upgrade your skills and gear to become a legendary hero. Will you fall to darkness or forge your legacy?
cartText: Join forces with players from around the world and embark on epic quests in Forge Legend
